add-file.description:
Append or prepend a file to a note identified by its title or id.
This call can't be performed if the app is a locked state.
Encrypted notes can't be accessed with this call.
Returns note's contents.

edit.description: place the cursor inside the note editor

mode.name: mode
mode.description: the allowed values are prepend, append, replace_all and replace (keep the note's title untouched)

new-window.name: new-window
new-window.description: open the note in an external window

open-note.name: open-note
open-note.description: display the new note in Bear's main or external window

show-window.name: show-window
show-window.description: force the opening of bear main window
